People always request I don't even see one thanks.I had to make this installer from scratch.And then do the paper work so it would function properly for you.Think about that be for you request something.A thank you seems pretty easy but apparently it's not.

thanks very much for this mate :) ) i never REQ for anything but would it be possible to get your hand on DIRK STUCK DESIGN - GROUND X TRAFFIC EUROPE EXTREME?? or maybe EZdok Camera update...thanks again mate for the nice upload

thanks man
@VaticanCity really sorry...A big thanks for all the hard work you do and well done it is really appreciated my many. Dont worry about the request. just keep up the good work
Big thanks VaticanCity

Thanks all for the Thanks, it does take time to make a proper installer from files from every where and try not to miss anything.So I hope it installed for you guy's ok.A reply back that it's working fine on your end would be nice.Thanks all and keep your wings level.

Thank you very much what a wonderful peice of scenery and very accurate rendition of "The Rock or Gib" as us Brits call it. Have also done a lot of sailing around it as well. Shame there isn't a decent sailing sim on Pirate Bay?
You're all welcome.I spent alot of Knights here drunk out of my head.Luck the Monkeys didn't carry me away.

As with some other Gibraltar versions here, some files are missing, therefore the traffic goes underground.... I upped the missing files on BTJunkie bec it seems I cant upload at TPB right now. check it .....

Don't download 600mb again, here are the "missing" files to make it all work:  http://ge.tt/6cm1t1x

Sorry for being a bit of a newbie, but how do i install? I've downloaded the files that jackblues gave (thanks, btw), but I can't figure out how to install. What should I do with the BGL files in the original rar? What should I do with the files jackblues gave?

Thanks!

jakeblues*

Another thing.. When I select the destination for the exe file, should I select the FSX folder, or any place I like?

My problems (which happen since I use win7 64bit):

1. There is no such destination: C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator\Application Data\Microsoft\FSX, even though I can see hidden files.

The closet I've found is:
C:\Users\Chaoshon\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\FSX
Is this correct?

2. After I reach the destination mentioned above, where should I add the lines written in the "read me"? In the FSX.cfg file?

3. I've got a problem with the following line that I'm told to add:
C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Microsoft Flight Simulator X\VistaMare\ViMaCoreX.dll 

Why? Well, everything I install to my FSX is located in: C:/Program Files (x86)/Microsoft Games etc'.
So should I add the (x86)?

A HUGE THANK YOU will be given free to whoever helps me lol.
